query.mssql:
WITH CTE AS ( -- Первый запрос select e.Id, c.Name as Counterparty, c.TIN as TIN, e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev as Contrtype, e.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero as Amount, FORMAT(e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as DocumentDate, r.Name as Author, m.Name as MVZ_MVP, a.Name as AccArt, s.Name as ProductName, r2.Name as BudgetOwner from Sungero_Content_EDoc e right join sberdev_SBContr_ContractualDo1 p on e.Id = p.EDoc right join sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev s on p.Product = s.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m on e.MVPBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti a on e.AccArtPrBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = a.Id left join Sungero_Parties_Counterparty c on e.Counterparty_Docflow_Sungero = c.Id left join Sungero_Core_Recipient r on e.Author = r.Id left join Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 on m.BudgetOwner = r2.Id where (e.Discriminator = 'F37C7E63-B134-4446-9B5B-F8811F6C9666' or e.Discriminator = '265F2C57-6A8A-4A15-833B-CA00E8047FA5') and e.HasVersions = 1 and e.OurSignatory_Docflow_Sungero is not null and e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev = 'Profitable' and e.Created >= @startDate and e.Created <= @endDate
UNION ALL
-- Второй запрос select e.Id, c.Name as Counterparty, c.TIN as TIN, e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev as Contrtype, e.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero as Amount, FORMAT(e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as DocumentDate, r.Name as Author, m.Name as MVZ_MVP, a.Name as AccArt, s.Name as ProductName, r2.Name as BudgetOwner from Sungero_Content_EDoc e right join sberdev_SBContr_ContractualDoc p on e.Id = p.EDoc right join sberdev_SberCon_ProductsAndDev s on p.Product = s.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m on e.MVZBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m.Id left join sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti a on e.AccArtExBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = a.Id left join Sungero_Parties_Counterparty c on e.Counterparty_Docflow_Sungero = c.Id left join Sungero_Core_Recipient r on e.Author = r.Id left join Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 on m.BudgetOwner = r2.Id where (e.Discriminator = 'F37C7E63-B134-4446-9B5B-F8811F6C9666' or e.Discriminator = '265F2C57-6A8A-4A15-833B-CA00E8047FA5') and e.HasVersions = 1 and e.OurSignatory_Docflow_Sungero is not null and e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev = 'Expendable' and e.Created >= @startDate and e.Created <= @endDate )
select distinct Id, Counterparty, TIN, Amount, DocumentDate, Author, MVZ_MVP, AccArt, stuff(( select concat(',', ProductName) from CTE where Id = t.Id order by ProductName for XML path('') ),1,1,'') as ProductName, BudgetOwner, Contrtype from CTE t where t.Contrtype = @type
